arts.ttl: Allegri and Gasperini’s mentor Galeone passes away aged 84 on day of Milan-Roma
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher The world of Italian football is in mourning after the news that Giovanni Galeone has passed away at the age of 84. The former player and coach of Pescara and Napoli, among many others, finally lost a long and brave battle with illness. His impact on the world of calcio is something that perhaps does […] The post Allegri and Gasperini’s mentor Galeone passes away aged 84 on day of Milan-Roma appeared first on SempreMilan.
